FLOW.COMMENT: ** You must set these variables before using this service **

MAP.COMMENT: ** You must set these variables before using this service **

INVOKE.COMMENT: STEP 1 - Generate a simple MIME message

BRANCH.COMMENT: STEP 2 - Sign and/or encrypt the MIME message according to SMimeAction setting

SEQUENCE.NAME: both
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: IF BOTH - Sign and encrypt the message

SEQUENCE.NAME: none
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: IF NONE - Do nothing to message
